alert.note: Alert for Central Middlesex County; Eastern Essex; Eastern Franklin; Eastern Hampden; Eastern Hampshire; Northern Worcester; Northwest Middlesex County; Southeast Middlesex; Southern Worcester; Western Essex; Western Franklin; Western Hampden; Western Hampshire; Western Norfolk (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 05 at 2:53AM EST until January 08 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH LATE SUNDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Portions of northern Connecticut, central, eastern, northeastern and western Massachusetts and northern Rhode Island. * WHEN...From Saturday afternoon through late Sunday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Snow loading from heavy wet snow may lead to power outages. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...there remains uncertainty in the exact track and intensity of the winter storm, therefore expect changes to later forecasts. Stay tuned.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
